ai_assistant.title: New! FinAI - Your Intelligent Financial Advisor
ai_assistant.description: FinAI is an advanced artificial intelligence that works as your personalized digital financial advisor.
ai_assistant.features: Check out some of the main features:

settings.appearance_desc: Configure how the application will be displayed
settings.show_values_desc: Show or hide monetary values in the interface
settings.localization_desc: Configure your preferred language and currency
settings.security_options_desc: Advanced security options are available in the Profile screen
settings.unsaved_changes_desc: You have made changes to your preferences. Click "Save preferences" to apply them.

onboarding.welcome_description: Your intelligent personal financial assistant. Let's explore the main features.
onboarding.dashboard_description: View your expenses, investments, and finances in one place. Interactive charts make it easy to understand your data.
onboarding.assistant_description: Our AI analyzes your financial data and offers personalized tips to save and invest better.
onboarding.planning_description: Set financial goals, track your progress, and receive guidance to reach them faster.
onboarding.customize_description: Adjust settings in the profile options to customize MoMoney to your needs.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: Thousands of people have already transformed their financial life with MoMoney. Check out some of their stories!
